subject: NoSuchMethodError: FileUtils.close(Writer)
msgSnippet: I have been using JUnit 3.8.1 with Ant 1.6.5 and it has been working fine.  Now I want to use it with Ant 1.7rc1 but I am getting this error:
messageBody:
I have been using JUnit 3.8.1 with Ant 1.6.5 and it has been
working fine. Now I want to use it with Ant 1.7rc1 but I am
getting this error:

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:
org.apache.tools.ant.util.FileUtils.close(Ljava/io/Writer;)V
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLJUnitResultFormatter.end
TestSuite(XMLJUnitResultFormatter.java:167)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.fireEndTest
Suite(JUnitTestRunner.java:561)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.run(JUnitTe
stRunner.java:415)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.launch(JUni
tTestRunner.java:841)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.JUnitTestRunner.main(JUnitT
estRunner.java:699)

I would guess it is a inconsistency with the JARs
but can anyone suggest something more specific or
how to fix it? Anyone using Ant 1.7rc1?

Thanks,
Dan
